input.summary: Input ID of the fixed lever 'starting' trigger

input.summary: Input ID of retractable lever on the right

output.summary: Output ID of miidle house light.

output.summary: Output ID of front-most house light.

output.name: Out_TDStim1
output.summary: Output ID to trigger presentation of stimulus 1. (ID 1)

output.name: Out_TDStim2
output.summary: Output ID to trigger presentation of stimulus 2. (ID 2)

output.name: Out_TDStimType
output.summary: Output ID to identify whether acoustic or electrical stim. (ID 4)

constant.name: Snd_ToneDuration
constant.summary: Duration of presentation of tone stimulus (in ms)

constant.name: Shk_ShockDuration
constant.summary: Duration of the electrical shock co-terminating with tone (in ms)

constant.summary: End the experiment - may be used if error occurrs

column.name: J_CompletedTrials
column.summary: Total number of trials that have occurred so far

column.summary: Number of trials remaining in current block

column.summary: Time post-commencement (msec) this trial occurred TOTAL - Not related to H:M:S

column.summary: 0=acoustic trial, 1=electrical trial, 2=discriminant acoustic trial without shock

constant.summary: Multiplier to be used for each trial

column.summary: An integer 0-120 to multiply by the (MaxITI - MinITI) and divided by 120 to get the 'inter-trial interval'

constant.name: F_TotalOffsets
constant.summary: Divisor to be used when using the offsets from array F (= max value of array of F, so after division falls into range 0-1 inclusive)

array.name: I

array.name: M

column.summary: Absolute milliseconds of this event ending

column.summary: Which band led to the trigger

constant.name: H_IndexMultiplier
constant.summary: Multiplier to be used for each signal
